import React from 'react'; const UserModal = ({ isOpen, onClose, formData, setFormData, onSubmit, isEdit }) => { if (!isOpen) return null; return (

{isEdit ? 'Edit User' : 'Create User'}

setFormData({ ...formData, first_name: e.target.value })} placeholder="First Name" className="w-full border p-2 rounded" required />
setFormData({ ...formData, last_name: e.target.value })} placeholder="Last Name" className="w-full border p-2 rounded" required />
setFormData({ ...formData, email: e.target.value })} placeholder="Email" className="w-full border p-2 rounded" required />
); }; export default UserModal;
